thread.title: Shraddha Kapoor reveals how to avoid negativity and her thoughts truly deserve an applause | Zee News
thread.title_full: Shraddha Kapoor reveals how to avoid negativity and her thoughts truly deserve an applause | Zee News

title: Shraddha Kapoor reveals how to avoid negativity and her thoughts truly deserve an applause | Zee News
text:
Shraddha Kapoor reveals how to avoid negativity and her thoughts truly deserve an applause By Raghav Jaitly | Last Updated: Tuesday, February 28, 2017 - 14:17 0 Follow @ZeeNews 
New Delhi: Bollywood actress Shraddha Kapoor is not just a pretty face. The 29-year-old actress is also blessed with an intelligent mind which is quite wisdomous. Recently, the 'Baaghi' diva proved the same by revealing how to avoid negativity in life. 
On Tuesday, Shraddha conducted a Q&A session with her online followers and she was flooded with interesting questions. This is when a Twitter user asked, "How to avoid negativity?'' 
To which, she replied, “Remind yourself that you have food to eat everyday, a shelter above your head & are already very fortunate.” Remind yourself that you have food to eat everyday, a shelter above your head & are already very fortunate #AskShraddha https://t.co/5ZL3puC2tP 
Well, her reply has only made us admire Shraddha's personality even more. MUST READ 
On the cinema front, she is gearing up for the release of Arjun Kapoor starrer 'Half Girlfriend'. It is expected to hit the silver screens on May 19 this year. First Published: Tuesday, February 28, 2017 - 14:17 More from zeenews
